resources.string: Reply to messages faster than ever.
Wow! Now wasn\'t that awesome? You can view your entire conversation at a glance. Tap outside the popup or press the checkmark to dismiss it.
This is QK Reply. Now you can reply to messages from anywhere. Tap the expand button to see what happens next :)
Themes, fonts, colors, avatars, and more
Configure MMS (APNs), max size, group messaging
Update the QKSMS icon to match your theme color
Tap to change message bubble preferences
Save battery and reduce eye strain
Save extra battery on devices with AMOLED displays
Color the background bubbles for outgoing messages
Color the background bubbles for incoming messages
Hide avatars for contacts in conversation list
Hide your avatar for outgoing messages
Hide contact avatar for incoming messages
Show the number of messages for each conversation
Sliding tab that allows you to quickly view your last conversation
Show the timestamp for when a message was sent, not received
Show your starred contacts in the QK Compose window, making them only a tap away
While in a conversation, bring your phone to your ear to start a call
Confirm that messages were sent successfully
Show a short toast to indicate a message being delivered
Long-press on a conversation and block to move to blocked inbox and stop notifications
Add additional phone numbers to block
Automatically delete incoming messages from numbers which are blocked through Should I Answer?
Only show mobile numbers in contact suggestions
Tap to change keyboard enter button behavior
When composing message to multiple people, send a group message instead of individual messages
Automatically download MMS messages when they become available
Turn on data automatically when sending or receiving MMS
Split long messages into separate messages
Adds a counter to the front of each split message
Send long messages as MMS instead of splitting them
Send long messages as MMS when they exceed the length of a number of messages
Show return key on keyboard instead of Emoji button
Turn your screen on when you receive a new message
Tap to change what should be hidden in notfication
Shows snippet of new message in notification bar
Vibrate when new messages are received
Call the sender of a message right from the notification
Mark message as read when notification is cleared
Wait before sending your messages, so you have a chance to review them
Time to wait before sending your message
Enable night mode automatically based on the time
Modify your preset responses to be used from your Android Wear device
Show QK Reply window whenever a new message is received
Tap anywhere outside of the window to close it
Display a notification that allows you to click on to compose a new message
Enable sending and receiving of MMS messages
Swap characters that are not supported in full-length messages for GSM compatible characters
Get rid of the gradient shown on the system UI bars on most KitKat devices
Fixes issues caused by immersive mode, Tinted Status Bar (Xposed), or custom DPI settings
Fixes issues caused by immersive mode, Tinted Status Bar (Xposed), or custom DPI settings
QKSMS is free. Help support us by donating!
Join the QKSMS Beta Testing community on Google+
QKSMS is open source. Contribute and report issues on GitHub
Join the QKSMS translation project on Crowdin
These changes will take effect the next time QKSMS is opened
Are you sure you would like to delete (%s) conversations?
Are you sure you would like to delete failed messages from (%s) conversations?
It appears that your APNs have not been set. This means that MMS will not work properly. Please press okay to have QKSMS find them for you :)
It appears that MMS hasn\'t been configured in QKSMS yet. Press okay automatically configure MMS.
Your message will be discarded because it has no valid recipients.
The state of threads and recipients is inconsistent. Please capture a bug report and report it via http://go/droidanizer
The entire thread will be deleted.
All messages on the SIM card will be deleted.
This message on the SIM card will be deleted.
QKSMS needs to be your SMS app to do that
QKSMS must be your SMS app to mark messages read
QKSMS must be your SMS app to mark messages unread
QKSMS must be your SMS app to delete messages
QKSMS must be your SMS app to send messages
Some things won\'t work until QKSMS is the default SMS app
Delayed messaging allows you to cancel messages before they send. Change the default behavior and more in Settings
Duration must be between 1 and 30 seconds
A read report will be sent.
QKSMS must be restarted when changing the icon color. Restart now?
Would you like to download the app from Google Play now?
"Phone storage is full. Delete some files to free space."
This feature has not yet been implemented. For now please use the Copy text option and paste that in the conversation you would like to send it
This feature has not yet been implemented
Purchase requires Google Play Store (billing) on your Android
EndlessJabber is not installed, opening Google Play
Couldn\'t load the changelog. Please try again later
Thank you for donating! You\'re my new best friend.
Thanks for the donation! I love you.
Thanks for donating! You\'re helping QKSMS become the best texting app ever made.
Thanks for the donation! You\'re awesome.
Attachments app not found. Try installing a photo gallery app!
The camera could not be opened
Select some contacts to send this message to!
QKSMS can\'t access the file you\'re trying to share!
Hold up! You\'ll get to send real messages in a minute!
Touch to add to your launcher from home screen.
You can now add it to your home screen again with the updated color.
Video messages may contain a harmful exploit that can leave your phone vulnerable to attacks. Would you like to continue?
It appears that MMS isn\'t set up in QKSMS. Press okay to automatically configure MMS.
Visit the MMS section of Settings to try automatic configuration, contact support, or enter your own configuration.
We couldn\'t find an MMS configuration for your carrier automatically. Press okay to contact support. We\'ll help you get set up!
We have found an MMS configuration for the %s carrier. Does that sound right?
We have found multiple MMS configurations. Choose your carrier from the list, or press N/A if your carrier isn\'t on the list.
Visit the MMS section of Settings to try automatic configuration again, contact support, or enter your own configuration.
If you encounter any issues, visit the MMS section of Settings to try automatic configuration again, contact support, or enter your own configuration.
Contact the QKSMS team for help setting up MMS
Use markdown syntax to get bold, underline, and italics in your messages
Couldn\'t send due to network problem.
Currently can\'t send your message. It will be sent when the service becomes available.
Can\'t download right now. Try again later.
No APN specified for the app, you need to set it up in settings!
Multiple different configurations have been found. Try one now. If it doesn\'t work, you can try a new one by going to Settings > Advanced > Load default APNs.
Try searching for your carrier\'s APN settings (MMSC, Port, and Proxy) and entering them in Settings > Advanced.
No messages yet.\nClick the + to send one!
